name: Webhook to Google Sheet
description: A privacy-focused, no-code solution to track your sales data in real-time directly into Google Sheets. Say goodbye to third-party analytics tools—your data stays where it belongs: with you.

sections.title: Real-Time Sales Logging
sections.text: Every sale gets captured instantly and logged into your Google Sheet. Whether from Gumroad, Payhip, or custom tools, it’s all automated and blazing fast.
sections.htmlText: Every sale gets captured instantly and logged into your Google Sheet. Whether from Gumroad, Payhip, or custom tools, it’s all automated and blazing fast.

sections.title: Private & Secure
sections.text: Unlike other tools, your sales data is never routed through third-party servers. Everything goes directly into your Google Sheet—safe, secure, and private.

sections.title: Built for Strategy
sections.text: Analyze trends, run campaigns, and refine product strategies with real-time insights—directly from your spreadsheet, no integrations needed.
